content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, Write a function `ispersonal` that returns a trait if the provided Vehicle type is a personal vehicle for everyday driving. All vehicles are subtypes of AbstractVehicle. Function must work for types: Car, Motorcycle, Bus, Truck. The first two should return true, the latter two should return false . The function should default to false for any other subtype of AbstractVehicle. Provide an example.

Here is a possible implementation in Julia. We define the `ispersonal` function to check if a vehicle type is a personal vehicle or not. 

```julia
abstract type AbstractVehicle end
abstract type Car <: AbstractVehicle end
abstract type Motorcycle <: AbstractVehicle end
abstract type Bus <: AbstractVehicle end
abstract type Truck <: AbstractVehicle end

function ispersonal(vehicle::T) where {T<:AbstractVehicle}
    if T == Car || T == Motorcycle
        return true
    elseif T == Bus || T == Truck 
        return false
    else 
        return false
    end
end
```
This function works for types `Car`, `Motorcycle`, `Bus` and `Truck`. For other subtypes of AbstractVehicle, it returns `false` as default. You can test the function with an example:

```julia
println(ispersonal(Car)) # true
println(ispersonal(Motorcycle)) # true
println(ispersonal(Bus)) # false
println(ispersonal(Truck)) # false
```
